itemDescription: chairman and CEO of Nestlé UK & Ireland

wikipedia_page.main: Dame Fiona Marie Kendrick,  (born 5 May 1955) is the former chairman and chief executive of Nestlé UK & Ireland, the manufacturers of Kit Kat. Nestlé UK & Ireland has a turnover of around £2.7bn, with 8,000 employees over 23 sites.
